attributes.description: Overview of Alert Finding and Incident assets in Axonius.

params.markdown:
**Overview**

This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of Alert Findings and Incident Assets collected from Axonius.

It highlights the alert and incident activity observed across the environment, giving immediate visibility into the most frequent and high-impact security events. A breakdown of alerts by severity and status helps analysts quickly understand the proportion of critical, high, medium, and low-level findings, along with how many alerts are open, or closed.

Additional views show how incidents evolve from these alerts, including distributions by risk level, severity, and alert status. Time-based trends and top source tables provide further context, helping teams identify recurring trouble areas and understand which systems or integrations generate the most alerts and incidents. These perspectives help analysts detect emerging threats, assess incident impact, and prioritize response efforts efficiently.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/axonius)**

attributes.title: [Logs Axonius] Alerts and Incidents
